service.name: accumulo_tserver_process_percent
service.label: Percent TServers Available
service.description: This service-level alert is triggered if the configured percentage of TServer processes cannot be determined to be up and listening on the network for the configured warning and critical thresholds. It aggregates the results of TServer process down checks.

ACCUMULO_MASTER.name: accumulo_master_process
ACCUMULO_MASTER.label: Accumulo Master Process
ACCUMULO_MASTER.description: This alert is triggered if the Accumulo master process cannot be confirmed to be up and listening on the network for the configured critical threshold, given in seconds.

ACCUMULO_TSERVER.name: accumulo_tserver_process
ACCUMULO_TSERVER.label: Accumulo TServer Process
ACCUMULO_TSERVER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the TServer processes cannot be confirmed to be up and listening on the network for the configured critical threshold, given in seconds.
